title: BOTH SOLD: T206 Polar Bear Speaker & T207 Gardner
author: Jason Carota

posts.post_title: BOTH SOLD: T206 Polar Bear Speaker & T207 Gardner
posts.post_content:
PSA 1 (MC) T206 Polar Bear Tris Speaker (Everett Campbell stamp on reverse): SOLD - $100

PSA 3 T207 William Lawrence Gardner: SOLD - $38

Prices include shipping. PayPal preferred, USPS money orders and personal checks (must clear before shipping) accepted. Second scan for each card has the slab cropped out.

[url]jason_carota@comcast.net[/url]
